verses.name: Romans 13:7
verses.text: Render therefore to all their dues: tribute to whom tribute is due; custom to whom custom; fear to whom fear; honour to whom honour.

verses.name: Romans 13:8
verses.text: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.

verses.name: Romans 13:9
verses.text: For this, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not kill, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness, Thou shalt not covet; and if there be any other commandment, it is briefly comprehended in this saying, namely, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
